rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do Any co-req unit set {MAE-MAT, MAEMATS01} Otherwise true
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do true Otherwise Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MSC3111, MTE3542}

description: An introduction to the computational/modelling approaches currently available in materials science and engineering is provided. The reasons for using modelling approaches are discussed and the different types of models available are outlined. For each of the length scales important in understanding material behaviour (nano-, micro-, meso- and macro-), the available modelling techniques are outlined and their principles, methods of implementation, advantages, disadvantages and perceived future developments are discussed. Examples of modelling approaches will be selected from all classes of materials. The general methodology used for constructing models is emphasised.
